About the game.

Magicae Verbum is a game currently in development for PC by Anderson Bros Game co. It is a 2D Metroidvania game highly inspired by games like Super Metroid, Hallow Knight, Iconoclasts, and Celeste. The game takes place in a somewhat dystopian future where man kind has spread through out the galaxy. You play as a young father who is determined to protect his daughter Molly from the world around them.
